quote: Daffy bent down suddenly, and picked a small startled white flower. ""Anemone,"" he said, handing it over; he made her repeat the word until she had it right. ""Find me a silk to match that.
quote_letters: DAFFY BENT DOWN SUDDENLY AND PICKED A SMALL STARTLED WHITE FLOWER ANEMONE HE SAID HANDING IT OVER HE MADE HER REPEAT THE WORD UNTIL SHE HAD IT RIGHT FIND ME A SILK TO MATCH THAT
